alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 6:31PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Utah and east central Tooele Counties through 700 PM MDT... At 630 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Tooele Army Depot South, or 23 miles east of Dugway English Village, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eagle Mountain, Cedar Fort, Ophir, Tooele Army Depot South, Fairfield and Faust. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley
